name: Serveraddons
body:
ServerAddons
============
This is the repository for all of the current server addons. More will be added as requested.

To install:
   With _svn_: Still working on this.
   Without _svn_: Download the .zip file and unzip to your garrysmod/garrysmod folder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
